field.label: API Endpoint
field.help: When left empty, Scrutiny will default to http://localhost:8080:

field.label: Host ID
field.help: Enter a name to identify this machine; used to group disks in Scrutiny.

field.label: Log file
field.help:
Where to write logs; leave blank to disable file logging. Paths can be absolute or relative.
Note: Paths are relative to the working directory. For the cron, that's /root. If you run the collector in a shell, it might not be.

field.label: Enable collector
field.help: Adds a root cron that runs the Scrutiny collector command once every 15 minutes.

field.label: Output to syslog
field.help: Redirects output to the General system log with messages tagged as scrutiny.

field.label: Debug mode
field.help: Whether to enable debug output (the equivalent of passing --debug to the collector).
